Utilities
BootstrapAround

Countdown

Timer that counts down in seconds, minutes, hours and days to any date.

Around component
Date / time format to use inside data attribute:
data-countdown='MM/DD/YYYY HH:mm:ss AM/PM'

Example:

data-countdown='10/01/2021 07:00:00 PM'

Basic example + Alignment

  • Result
  • HTML
  • Pug
0Days
0Hours
0Mins
0Secs
0Days
0Hours
0Mins
0Secs
0Days
0Hours
0Mins
0Secs
<!-- Left aligned countdown (default) -->
<div class="cs-countdown h4" data-countdown="10/01/2021 07:00:00 PM">
  <div class="cs-countdown-days">
    <span class="cs-countdown-value">0</span>
    <span class="cs-countdown-label text-body">Days</span>
  </div>
  <div class="cs-countdown-hours">
    <span class="cs-countdown-value">0</span>
    <span class="cs-countdown-label text-body">Hours</span>
  </div>
  <div class="cs-countdown-minutes">
    <span class="cs-countdown-value">0</span>
    <span class="cs-countdown-label text-body">Mins</span>
  </div>
  <div class="cs-countdown-seconds">
    <span class="cs-countdown-value">0</span>
    <span class="cs-countdown-label text-body">Secs</span>
  </div>
</div>

<!-- Center aligned countdown -->
<div class="cs-countdown h4 justify-content-center" data-countdown="10/01/2021 07:00:00 PM">
  ...
</div>

<!-- Right aligned countdown -->
<div class="cs-countdown h4 justify-content-end" data-countdown="10/01/2021 07:00:00 PM">
  ...
</div>
// Left aligned countdown (default)
.cs-countdown.h4(data-countdown="10/01/2021 07:00:00 PM")
  .cs-countdown-days
    span.cs-countdown-value 0
    span.cs-countdown-label.text-body Days
  .cs-countdown-hours
    span.cs-countdown-value 0
    span.cs-countdown-label.text-body Hours
  .cs-countdown-minutes
    span.cs-countdown-value 0
    span.cs-countdown-label.text-body Mins
  .cs-countdown-seconds
    span.cs-countdown-value 0
    span.cs-countdown-label.text-body Secs

// Center aligned countdown
.cs-countdown.h4.justify-content-center(data-countdown="10/01/2021 07:00:00 PM")
  ...

// Right aligned countdown
.cs-countdown.h4.justify-content-end(data-countdown="10/01/2021 07:00:00 PM")
  ...

<!-- Alter countdown sizing using h1-h6, display1-display4 classes -->
<div class="cs-countdown h1" data-countdown="10/01/2021 07:00:00 PM">
  ...
</div>

<div class="cs-countdown h2" data-countdown="10/01/2021 07:00:00 PM">
  ...
</div>

<div class="cs-countdown h3" data-countdown="10/01/2021 07:00:00 PM">
  ...
</div>

<div class="cs-countdown h4" data-countdown="10/01/2021 07:00:00 PM">
  ...
</div>

<div class="cs-countdown h5" data-countdown="10/01/2021 07:00:00 PM">
  ...
</div>

<div class="cs-countdown h6" data-countdown="10/01/2021 07:00:00 PM">
  ...
</div>
// Alter countdown sizing using h1-h6, display1-display4 classes
.cs-countdown.h1(data-countdown="10/01/2021 07:00:00 PM")
  ...

.cs-countdown.h2(data-countdown="10/01/2021 07:00:00 PM")
  ...

.cs-countdown.h3(data-countdown="10/01/2021 07:00:00 PM")
  ...

.cs-countdown.h4(data-countdown="10/01/2021 07:00:00 PM")
  ...

.cs-countdown.h5(data-countdown="10/01/2021 07:00:00 PM")
  ...

.cs-countdown.h6(data-countdown="10/01/2021 07:00:00 PM")
  ...

<!-- Multicolor -->
<div class="cs-countdown h4" data-countdown="10/01/2021 07:00:00 PM">
  <div class="cs-countdown-days text-primary">
    <span class="cs-countdown-value"></span>
    <span class="cs-countdown-label opacity-60">Days</span>
  </div>
  <div class="cs-countdown-hours text-warning">
    <span class="cs-countdown-value"></span>
    <span class="cs-countdown-label opacity-60">Hours</span>
  </div>
  <div class="cs-countdown-minutes text-success">
    <span class="cs-countdown-value"></span>
    <span class="cs-countdown-label opacity-60">Mins</span>
  </div>
  <div class="cs-countdown-seconds text-danger">
    <span class="cs-countdown-value"></span>
    <span class="cs-countdown-label opacity-60">Secs</span>
  </div>
</div>

<!-- Light version (white text on dark background) -->
<div class="cs-countdown h4 text-light" data-countdown="10/01/2021 07:00:00 PM">
  <div class="cs-countdown-days">
    <span class="cs-countdown-value">0</span>
    <span class="cs-countdown-label opacity-60">Days</span>
  </div>
  <div class="cs-countdown-hours">
    <span class="cs-countdown-value">0</span>
    <span class="cs-countdown-label opacity-60">Hours</span>
  </div>
  <div class="cs-countdown-minutes">
    <span class="cs-countdown-value">0</span>
    <span class="cs-countdown-label opacity-60">Mins</span>
  </div>
  <div class="cs-countdown-seconds">
    <span class="cs-countdown-value">0</span>
    <span class="cs-countdown-label opacity-60">Secs</span>
  </div>
</div>
// Multicolor
.cs-countdown.h4(data-countdown="10/01/2021 07:00:00 PM")
  .cs-countdown-days.text-primary
    span.cs-countdown-value 0
    span.cs-countdown-label.opacity-60 Days
  .cs-countdown-hours.text-warning
    span.cs-countdown-value 0
    span.cs-countdown-label.opacity-60 Hours
  .cs-countdown-minutes.text-success
    span.cs-countdown-value 0
    span.cs-countdown-label.opacity-60 Mins
  .cs-countdown-seconds.text-danger
    span.cs-countdown-value 0
    span.cs-countdown-label.opacity-60 Secs

// Light version (white text on dark background)
.cs-countdown.h4.text-light(data-countdown="10/01/2021 07:00:00 PM")
  .cs-countdown-days
    span.cs-countdown-value 0
    span.cs-countdown-label.opacity-60 Days
  .cs-countdown-hours
    span.cs-countdown-value 0
    span.cs-countdown-label.opacity-60 Hours
  .cs-countdown-minutes
    span.cs-countdown-value 0
    span.cs-countdown-label.opacity-60 Mins
  .cs-countdown-seconds
    span.cs-countdown-value 0
    span.cs-countdown-label.opacity-60 Secs

<!-- Border version -->
<div class="cs-countdown h5" data-countdown="10/01/2021 07:00:00 PM">
  <div class="cs-countdown-days border rounded py-2 px-3">
    <span class="cs-countdown-value">0</span>
    <span class="cs-countdown-label text-body">Days</span>
  </div>
  <div class="cs-countdown-hours border rounded py-2 px-3">
    <span class="cs-countdown-value">0</span>
    <span class="cs-countdown-label text-body">Hours</span>
  </div>
  <div class="cs-countdown-minutes border rounded py-2 px-3">
    <span class="cs-countdown-value">0</span>
    <span class="cs-countdown-label text-body">Mins</span>
  </div>
  <div class="cs-countdown-seconds border rounded py-2 px-3">
    <span class="cs-countdown-value">0</span>
    <span class="cs-countdown-label text-body">Secs</span>
  </div>
</div>

<!-- Shadow version -->
<div class="cs-countdown h5" data-countdown="10/01/2021 07:00:00 PM">
  <div class="cs-countdown-days box-shadow rounded py-2 px-3">
    <span class="cs-countdown-value">0</span>
    <span class="cs-countdown-label text-body">Days</span>
  </div>
  <div class="cs-countdown-hours box-shadow rounded py-2 px-3">
    <span class="cs-countdown-value">0</span>
    <span class="cs-countdown-label text-body">Hours</span>
  </div>
  <div class="cs-countdown-minutes box-shadow rounded py-2 px-3">
    <span class="cs-countdown-value">0</span>
    <span class="cs-countdown-label text-body">Mins</span>
  </div>
  <div class="cs-countdown-seconds box-shadow rounded py-2 px-3">
    <span class="cs-countdown-value">0</span>
    <span class="cs-countdown-label text-body">Secs</span>
  </div>
</div>
// Border version
.cs-countdown.h5(data-countdown="10/01/2021 07:00:00 PM")
  .cs-countdown-days.border.rounded.py-2.px-3
    span.cs-countdown-value 0
    span.cs-countdown-label.text-body Days
  .cs-countdown-hours.border.rounded.py-2.px-3
    span.cs-countdown-value 0
    span.cs-countdown-label.text-body Hours
  .cs-countdown-minutes.border.rounded.py-2.px-3
    span.cs-countdown-value 0
    span.cs-countdown-label.text-body Mins
  .cs-countdown-seconds.border.rounded.py-2.px-3
    span.cs-countdown-value 0
    span.cs-countdown-label.text-body Secs

// Shadow version
.cs-countdown.h5(data-countdown="10/01/2021 07:00:00 PM")

    span.cs-countdown-value 0
    span.cs-countdown-label.text-body Days
